title: How to charge your iPhone without wires!
description: (   ) --- Today's Mystery Video -   Spigen Wireless Charge Case for iPhone 6s -   This case enables the iPhone 6s (or iPhone 6s Plus) to be charged wirelessly. Wireless charging is achieved through the ubiquitous Qi charging medium. Finally my iPhone 6s can wireless charge like some of my other devices!  FOLLOW ME IN THESE PLACES FOR UPDATES Twitter -  Facebook -  Instagram -  Google Plus -
